fields.answer: Both Brand Oriented and Purpose oriented identity

fields.name: In social media, what type of marketing has become important for advertisers?

fields.name: Guidelines for writing and using blogs and wikis include all of the following EXCEPT:
options: Check blog and wiki entries for credibility.
Write the same content for internal and external audiences.
Keep Web writing guidelines in mind.
fields.answer: Write the same content for internal and external audiences.

fields.name: On integrating their website with Facebook, what results did Daily Motion (a video site) achieve within 2 months

2 million visits/day from Facebook & 2 million stories published back to Facebook
3 million visits/day from Facebook & 1 million stories published back to Facebook
6 million visits/day from Facebook & 2 million stories published back to Facebook
fields.answer: 6 million visits/day from Facebook & 2 million stories published back to Facebook

fields.name: How have blogs, wikis, and social networks changed how we work and learn?
options: They have improved access to medical research.
More students are enrolled in online courses.
More workers commute to the office.
fields.answer: More students are enrolled in online courses.

fields.name: What is the right way to handle negative criticism on social media

Bribe the users who are complaining to shut up
Ignore the complaints of the users
Listen to their complaints, address & resolve their queries quickly
fields.answer: Listen to their complaints, address & resolve their queries quickly

fields.name: Blogs are:
options: web pages that serve as publicly accessible personal journals and online forums.
business-oriented websites that let users create profiles for professional networking.
Internet browsers where search results are personalized for each user.
two different types of social media.
fields.answer: two different types of social media.

fields.name: An employee posted update on the Facebook wall of her company which was meant to be done on her personal profile. What action should the company take on an immediate basis
options: Delete the update and enquire into the matter
Dont delete the update but fire the employee
fields.answer: Delete the update and enquire into the matter

fields.name: The product concept says that a company should ________.

improve marketing of its best products
focus on the target market and make products that meet those customers' demands
devote its energy to making continuous product improvements
fields.answer: devote its energy to making continuous product improvements

fields.name: A company sells school and college stationary online. Which of the following social media tactics should they use to increase traffic to their website
options: Integrate their website with social networks like Facebook and advertise on it
Spend money on LinkedIn advertisement and participate in LinkedIn group discussions
Send emails to student groups in schools & colleges
fields.answer: Integrate their website with social networks like Facebook and advertise on it

To be different and leverage the popularity of blending objects like iphone and to showcase the power of their blenders

You can only use predefined filters with unfiltered views
There is no reason to maintain an unfiltered view
Since raw data cannot be reprocessed, maintaining an unfiltered view ensures that the original data can always be accessed
fields.answer: Since raw data cannot be reprocessed, maintaining an unfiltered view ensures that the original data can always be accessed

You have Linear attribution model set up. Now consider following data, Visitor came to your site via natural search keyword and then he came from Social media and after that he came from Paid search keyword "Buy Tickets" and than he came from paid search keyword "Buy Travel Tickets" and then he buys $100 worth of tickets.
options: "Buy Tickets" keyword will be credited with $25 purchase
"Buy Travel Tickets" will be credited with $100 purchase
Natural search keyword, social media, "Buy Tickets, and "Buy Travel Tickets" will be credited with $100 purchase
Natural search keyword will get $100 purchase
fields.answer: "Buy Tickets" keyword will be credited with $25 purchase

fields.name: Within a 30-day period a user visits your website first from a social media ad, then from a banner ad on a news site, and then from a paid search ad. On the final visit the user submits a "Contact" form that you track as a Goal conversion. Which of the following statements are true about how the user's activity will be reported?
options: The social media ad will get all the credit for the conversion because it was the first source that brought the user to your site.
All three channels will be given equal credits for the transaction since all played a role in reaching to a transaction.
In the All Traffic report all three traffic sources will get credit for the conversion.
In the All Traffic report only the paid search ad will get credit for the conversion.
fields.answer: In the All Traffic report only the paid search ad will get credit for the conversion.

The session ends once the user is inactive for 30 minutes or more

Have 1 account, 1 property ID and 2 views
Have 2 Different Accounts and 2 different property IDs
Have 2 different accounts and 1 property ID
fields.answer: Have 1 account, 1 property ID and 2 views

fields.name: You own three different websites that operate independently but are all a part of the same company. Which of the following is the best way to set up your Google Analytics account for these sites?
options: Create three different accounts, one for each website, so that no account settings overlap for the sites.
Create three different properties, one for each website, so that each site has its own unique tracking code.
Create three different views under the same property (one for each website) so that the data for all three sites is aggregated in your reports.
fields.answer: Create three different views under the same property (one for each website) so that the data for all three sites is aggregated in your reports.
